description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. Upali Samaraweera as the Arbitrator - Industrial Dispute - Mr. W. G. B. M. Ranaweera and the Nation Lanka Finance PLC. - Revocation of Order made to appoint Mr. M. Ariff as the Arbitrator and appoint Mr. Palitha Weerasekara as the Arbitrator - Industrial Dispute - Mr. D. P. D. Wickramaarachchi and Ceylon Electricity Board
